tool_description: An API to get all the latest news on Climate Change around the world.
name: Live Climate Change News_v2
title: Live Climate Change News

api_list.name: Get Individual news articles from News on Climate Change
api_list.description: Get a news article from specific News resource on Climate Change.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-change-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-change-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-change-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-change-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the news about Climate Change from all over the world.
